ratings.comment: Amazing and passionate professor. She works very hard to discuss all concepts and is so willing to help. As long as you participate and allow yourself to learn, she will love you! Her notes and explanations are clear and enjoyable.

Great professor! I took her my freshman year at UIC and she is amazing! There is a lot of reading (but that is to be expected in philosophy). However, the reading I enjoyable. She explains concepts very clearly and I always looked forward to her lectures/discussion. I would def recommend this course with her.

I had to take this class for QR, and it turned out to be one of my favorites. She is so helpful and passionate, just attend class and pay attention and you can't go wrong. She does more than enough in-class exercises and practice to make sure you are ready for the tests, and her up to date examples were always funny and interesting.

Danielle is a GREAT professor. She made this class easy to understand, and explained all concepts thoroughly. The tests are fair and the practice tests do more than enough to prepare you. She is funny, charming, and obviously VERY well educated on the topic.
Best TA at Madison hands-down!  She knows her stuff.  Not to mention, she's pretty nice to look at, too.

As a sophomore I can say that Danielle was definitely one of the best TAs I've had. Extremely helpful, holds office hours and has review sessions. Complemented Sidelle particularly well because she was really clear. Highly recommended
